doc:
Mary Miles Minter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Miles_Minter 0 Mary Miles Minter (born Juliet Reilly; April 25, 1902 – August 4, 1984) was an American actress. She appeared in 54 silent era motion pictures from 1912 to 1923. In 1922, Minter was involved in scandal surrounding the murder of director William Desmond Taylor, for whom she professed her love. Although gossip implicated her mother, former actress Charlotte Shelby, as the murderer, Minter's reputation was tarnished, and she gave up her movie career in 1923. Mary_Miles Minter ( born Juliet_Reilly ; April_25_,_1902 – August_4_,_1984 ) was an_American_actress . She appeared in 54_silent_era_motion_pictures from 1912 to 1923 . In 1922 , Minter was_involved in scandal surrounding the_murder of director_William_Desmond_Taylor , for whom she professed her_love . Although gossip implicated her_mother , former_actress_Charlotte_Shelby , as the_murderer , Minter 's_reputation was_tarnished , and she gave up her_movie_career in 1923 .
